snippet: The N.I.T. and Madison Square Garden agreed to a three-year contract extension to keep the tournament at the arena through 2018.
abstract: National Invitation Tournament and Madison Square Garden agree to three-year contract extension through 2018.
lead_paragraph: The N.I.T. and Madison Square Garden agreed to a three-year contract extension to keep the tournament at the arena through 2018.

headline.main: N.I.T. Is Staying at Madison Square Garden
headline.print_headline: N.I.T. Is Staying at the Garden
